about.title: Welcome to Geo Mandiri Kreasi
about.desc: PT Geo Mandiri Kreasi is a company engaged in consulting, training, and inspection services related to Occupational Safety and Health (K3) and construction. As a certified and official business entity, we are committed to supporting the creation of safe, efficient, and compliant work environments.

points.2: Provides certified K3 training by the Ministry of Manpower

infoK3.subtitle: Training & Certification
infoK3.title:
K3 TRAINING INFORMATION
CERTIFIED BY KEMNAKER & BNSP
infoK3.desc1: Every company in Indonesia is required to implement occupational safety and health (K3) in the workplace. Now, K3 training and certification can also be conducted online, such as those organized by PT GEO MANDIRI KREASI in Jakarta.
infoK3.desc2: This training helps workers understand and apply safety and health principles in various industrial fields — from K3 experts and operators to technicians.
